heroSection.title: The unique people behind the magic.

textSection.mdMain:
Our team includes a wide range of unique talent, including **world-class software developers, designers, product managers, and bureaucracy hackers** from both the private sector and within government. In addition to bringing in private sector and government talent, DDS partners with military services by **detailing service members to DDS teams** to tackle some of the DoD's highest priority challenges.

We currently have approximately 82 employees at DDS - **a mix of civilian, military, and contractor** - spread out across our permanent office spaces.
textSection.mdCallout:
**We're focused on hiring the best to serve the best.**

Interested in proving hoodies, hackers, and nerds have an important role to play in furthering national defense messions?
